title-group.article-title: LAYER STRIPPING METHOD FOR POTENTIAL INVERSION

permissions.copyright-statement: Copyright 1999 ICMSEC, Chinese Academy of Sciences and VSP

abstract.p: To solve the potential inversion problem of the coupled system for one-way wave equations, the absorbing boundary conditions in the lateral direction are derived. The difference schemes are constructed and a layer stripping method is proposed. Some numerical experiments are presented.
